headline: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) Supports Sintetica's Digital Transformation With FactoryTalk PharmaSuite MES
summary: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) recently announced the adoption of its FactoryTalk PharmaSuite by Sintetica SA, a step aimed at enhancing production efficiency in Switzerland. This strategic movement aligns with several impactful product launches and client collaborations over the past quarter, during which the company's shares rose 20%. Additional developments include enhancements in industrial computing technology for energy projects and significant client implementations in various sectors,...
